#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits>
#include <stdio.h>
#include<set>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#define ll long long
#define SIZE 100003
#define MOD 1000000009
using namespace std;
ll dp[1000002];
int main()
{
    int t,i;
    dp[1]=0;
    dp[2]=1;
    dp[3]=1;
    dp[4]=1;
    for(i=5;i<=1000002;i++)
        {
           dp[i]=(dp[i-2]+dp[i-3])%MOD;

        }
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {int sum;
        cin>>sum;

        cout<<dp[sum]<<'\n';
    }
}
